title: Game Progress Route
content:
I think I can handle you. All right - how much do you want? [Melee Attack] Stand down. [Intimidation] I could give you that gold - but then I'd just take it back after I killed you. Let's find out shall we?

Choose the first option, and with enough charisma, you'll startle Zenovia. She abandons her intention to rob you and departs. Proceed to enter Arfur's mansion and speak to Ben. Thank him for standing up for them, and reply with:
